channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Originalist ‘Bombshell’ Complicates Case on Trump’s Power to Fire Officials

item.title: Pastors and staff from underground church are arrested in China

item.title: What We Know About the Deal Between Israel and Hamas
item.description: Hostages in Gaza will be swapped for Palestinian prisoners in Israel. The last 20 living hostages were released on Monday morning.

item.title: She was about to drop out of college, but then her professor stepped in

item.title: Amid shutdown, Trump administration guts department overseeing special education

item.title: Who Are the Hostages Released From Captivity in Gaza?
item.description: Israel says 20 living hostages have been freed as part of a prisoner exchange. Here’s what we know about them.

item.title: Three Share Nobel in Economics for Work on How Technology Drives Growth
item.description: Joel Mokyr was awarded half of the prize, and Philippe Aghion and Peter Howitt shared the other half.

item.title: Media companies thought late night TV was irrelevant. Kimmel proved them wrong
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel's return to airwaves might just point the way forward for late night TV to prove its relevance to American audiences — and to itself.

item.title: Why Ukraine Is Betting on Strikes Deep Inside Russia
item.description: The Kremlin will only negotiate if missiles and drones bring the pain of war home to Russians, Ukrainian officials say.
